list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: coat or mark (something) messily or carelessly with a greasy or sticky substance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his face was smeared with dirt
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khuôn mặt anh ta bị bôi bẩn với bụi bẩn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: damage the reputation of (someone) by false accusations; slander.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: someone was trying to smear her by faking letters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ai đó đang cố gắng bôi nhọ cô ấy bằng cách giả mạo thư

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark or streak of a greasy or sticky substance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was an oil smear on his jacket
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một vết bẩn dầu trên áo khoác của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sample of material spread thinly on a microscope slide for examination, typically for medical diagnosis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the smears were stained for cryptosporidium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các vết bẩn đã được nhuộm cho cryptosporidium

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a false accusation intended to damage someone's reputation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the media were indulging in unwarranted smears
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các phương tiện truyền thông đang đắm chìm trong những vết bẩn không chính đáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: soon you're eyeballing the top, just one smear away
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chẳng mấy chốc, bạn là nhãn cầu trên đỉnh, chỉ là một vết bẩn đi
